document.full_text: the former c.i.a. operative was cleared on charges that he lied about how he entered the united states and his involvement in cuban hotel bombings in 1997.
document.title: jury clears cuban exile of charges that he lied to u.s.
lines_and_colors: the former c.i.a. operative was cleared on charges that he lied about how he entered the united states and his involvement in cuban hotel bombings in 1997.
